scripts.serve: browser-sync start --proxy localhost --startPath Workflow/src/index.html --files "src/css/*.css, src/js/*.js, src/*.html, src/*.php, !node_modules/**/*.html"
scripts.uglify: mkdirp dist/js && uglifyjs src/js/*.js -m -o dist/js/app.js && uglifyjs dist/js/*.js -m -c -o dist/js/app.min.js
scripts.build:css: npm run scss && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.build:css-dist: npm run scss-dist && npm run autoprefixer-dist
scripts.build:js-dist: npm run lint && npm run uglify
scripts.build:all: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:images
scripts.build:all-dist: npm run build:css-dist && npm run build:js-dist && npm run build:images-dist && npm run build:html
scripts.postinstall: npm run build:all && npm run watch:all
